TopicTitle: Deselect currently selected part in the VAB

Articles.Content:
When building a rocket, sometimes I will select a part to move by accident. This can be especially problematic on larger rockets. Most the times I just place the part and then hit `ctrl+z` but sometimes this just doesn't work, or messes other things up.

Is there any way to deselect the current part?

Aside from ctrl+z or just putting the part back correctly (may not have desired results if you have intakes/jets), sorry no . Unless of course you saved shortly beforehand, in which case you can just re-load it .

I had to go try this because it has become instinctive and I couldn't remember just what it is I do.

If I accidentally pick up an attached part, I discard it by dropping it on the part list and then do ctrl-z. Seems to work every time.
